original_text: But the flesh of the bull and its skin and its dung you shall burn with fire outside the camp; it is a sin offering.
korean_text: 그 수소의 고기와 가죽과 똥을 진 밖에서 불사르라 이는 속죄제니라

sentences.original_text: But the flesh of the bull and its skin and its dung
you shall burn with fire outside the camp
